content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Iron Plate Smelting Station at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of: Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Use-case: Smelting iron ore into iron plates to support production.

### Copper Plate Smelting Station at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of: Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Use-case: Smelting copper ore into copper plates to alleviate resource shortages.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Usage Errors  
 – When calling get_entities(), avoid unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) and ensure the number of positional arguments matches the function’s signature.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures  
 – Verify that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting placement.  
 – Ensure all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels and electronic-circuits) are sufficiently available before initiating lab crafting.

• NoneType Iteration Issue  
 – When retrieving entities, check for a None result and default to an empty list to prevent iteration errors.
